Summary: two, maybe 3 lights. One light emiited off the other to make three. chevron shaped when illuminated
trends: There has been one other sighting in Waterville
There were no other sightings in Waterville on or around February 18th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsto my right was a star like object, appearing then disappearing, glowing brighter then diminish, emmited a light that almost appeared as though the light emmited had "walked away" from original light. it was chevron shaped when it glowed, yellow in the middle outlined in red. To my left suddenly appeared another flickering star light that ascended to the sky towards my direction and upwards. faster than an airplane but not 'zooming fast'. i watched until i was physically shaking too much and was afraid i'd get a migrain like i had in previous sightings. I couldn't stare any longer so I came inside. Odd though, that it wasn't like I had never seen them before, so it didn't have that same "wow" effect. it was somehow like they were telling me something i already knew. i would have taken a picture but they were too high in the sky and my camera would have never captured it.
